mapper.select: select a.comCode, comName, ceo, manager, comPhone, branchName, c.floor, officeName, contractDate, rentStartDate, rentFinishDate, id from companyInfo a left outer join masterAccount b on a.comCode=b.comCode left outer join office c on a.officeNum=c.officeNum left outer join branch d on c.branchCode=d.branchCode order by contractDate
mapper.update: update companyInfo a left outer join office b on a.officeNum=b.officeNum left outer join branch c on b.branchCode=c.branchCode set b.officeName=#{officeSelected}, a.contractDate=#{contractDateInput}, a. rentStartDate=#{MoveInDateInput}, a.rentFinishDate=#{MoveOutDateInput}, b.branchCode=(select c.branchCode from branch c where c.branchName=#{branchSelected}) where a.comCode=#{comCode}
mapper.select: select branchName, floor from branch a left outer join office b on a.branchCode=b.branchCode where branchName=#{branchName} group by floor

select branchName, officeName, c.floor, rentStartDate, rentFinishDate from companyInfo a left outer join office c on a.officeNum=c.officeNum left outer join branch b on b.branchCode=c.branchCode where floor=#{floor} and branchName=#{branchName} group by officeName

select c.officeNum, branchName, officeName, rentStartDate, rentFinishDate from companyInfo a left outer join office c on a.officeNum=c.officeNum left outer join branch b on b.branchCode=c.branchCode where c.officeName=#{officeName} and b.branchName=#{branchName} and c.floor=#{floor}
